original_text: I do not want to send them back to their homes while they are hungry. They might fall down during their journey because they are weak. Some of them have travelled a long way to come here.’
korean_text: 만일 내가 그들을 굶겨 집으로 보내면 길에서 기진하리라 그 중에는 멀리서 온 사람들도 있느니라

sentences.original_text: I do not want to send them back to their homes
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들을 집으로 돌려보내고 싶지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: They might fall down during their journey
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 여행 중에 넘어질 수도 있습니다

sentences.original_text: Some of them have travelled a long way
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 일부는 먼 길을 여행했습니다
